description: Albula Half Zip HS Hooded Jacket Men - a half-zipper rain jacket for hiking adventures. Environmentally friendly thanks to a main material made from 100% recycled polyester. Sustainably dyed using an environmentally friendly dope-dye method. Comfortable thanks to a very pleasant, lightweight and stretchable material. The Albula Half Zip is a practical rain jacket that can be easily stowed in its kangaroo pocket when not in use and secured using the supplied carabiner.
name: Mammut Albula Half Zip HS Hooded Jacket - Mens
